New Records: New Zealand posted their first 200-run total in a T20 World Cup match
Devon Conway hit the highest score in a T20I match against Australia with 92 not out
Tim Southee became the leading wicket-taker in men's T20Is with 3 wickets
New Zealand's 89-run victory was the second biggest defeat for Australia in T20 World Cups
Key Match Events: New Zealand's comprehensive victory over Australia in the opening match of the Super 12 stage
Australia's early loss of key players led to a significant turnaround in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand ended an 11-year wait for a win against Australia
The match was New Zealand's first win in Australia since 2011
